ComicInfo.Summary:
For the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition card stock cover of THE GOON #11 with art by "Reverend" Dave Johnson (credits include everything and every cool cover on everything).
The epic conclusion of Rodger Langridge's (Fred the Clown, The Muppets) & Mike Norton's (Revival, Battle Pug) run with the fourth installment of Witch's Brew! What started as a rivalry among local brewers has turned into a full scale turf war. This issue is a cautionary tale of what can happen when Lovecraftian fish-men, randy witches, and the wee folk from the old country hit the sauce too hard.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Eric Powell | 1 | Var | Cardstock Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 2 |
